name: aya-day-team
description: Project made during the first AYA Hackathon

scripts.install: cd client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i
scripts.postci: cd client && npm ci && cd ../server && npm ci
scripts.dev: npm run dev:back && npm run dev:front
scripts.test:back: cd server && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.test:front: cd client && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run test:back && npm run test:front
scripts.build: npm run build:back && npm run build:front

author: AYA-Experience
